page.syntax: Result_String as C = ANSI_TO_OEM(C string,N length)

argument.name: string
argument.description: A string variable containing the data to be translated.

argument.name: length
argument.description: The number of characters to translate. Numeric

page.discussion: The ANSI_TO_OEM() converts the specified Number_of_Characters in the Source_Buffer from the ANSI (Windows) character set to the OEM (DOS) character set, and returns the result in Result_String. Converts the specified Number of Characters in the Source Buffer from the ANSI (Windows) character set to the OEM (DOS) character set.
